name: Human Bingo
description: Human Bingo is an icebreaker game that helps people get to know each other. Each player gets a bingo card with squares that have descriptions of people. The goal is to find people who match the descriptions and get them to sign the corresponding square.
equipment: Human Bingo cards (one for each player)
basicRules: Give each player a Human Bingo card and a pen.
Players walk around the room and talk to other people to find someone who matches one of the descriptions on their card.
When a player finds someone who matches a description, they ask that person to sign the corresponding square on their card.
A person can only sign another player's card once.
The first player to get a 'bingo' (a line of signed squares, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the game.
tips: Encourage players to talk to people they don't know.
Make the descriptions on the bingo cards interesting and fun.
Have a prize for the winner.
